usage: 0-12: Thirty secont note; 13-36: Sixteenth note; 37-61: Eighth note triplet; 62-84: Eighth note; 85-110: Dotted eighth note; 111-127: Quarter note
0-15: No stretch rev; 16-30: 1.5x reverse; 31-46: 2x reverse; 47-60: 4x reverse; 61-80: Stalled; 81-96: 4x forward; 97-111: 2x forward; 112-126: 1.5x forward; 127: No stretch forward
0: Ignore MIDI clock; 1-127: Follow MIDI clock
0: Thirty second note; 1: Sixteenth note; 2: Eighth note triplet; 3: Eighth note; 4: Dotted eighth note; 5: Quarter note; 6: Half note; 7: Whole note
0: Thirty second note; 1: Sixteenth note; 2: Eighth note triplet; 3: Eighth note; 4: Dotted eighth note; 5: Quarter note; 6: Half note; 7: Whole note

notes: Resets the pedal: Ignore MIDI clock set to off; Octave transpose set to -+ 3 octaves; All clock dividers set to quarter notes; Portamento set to 0; Gate mode set to 0

usage: 1: 12 semitones; 2: 24 semitones; 3: 36 semitones; 4: 48 semitones; 5: 60 semitones; 6: 72 semitones; 7: 84 semitones; 8: 96 semitones; 9: 108 semitones
